text: Rude Boy USA is a collection of three crime stories by American author Victoria Bolton. The story takes place in New York City and Jamaica, and the main characters are Bernie "Banks" Rhodos, Celia "Bunny" Jones, John LeBlanc, Ben Berardi, and Jerome Dexter-Dixon. == Film adaptations == The first book in the Rude Boy USA series has been turned into a full script for a movie by screenwriter Doug Klozzer. == References == Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: Rude Boy USA
